stitch or garter stitch and create a double brim beanie with a smooth seam instructions using a provisional cast on method this will keep the stitches live to accomplish a smoother less bulky seam co 40 45 48 50 55 stitches join in the round this pattern is worked entirely in the round in stockinette brim rounds 1 26 26 30 32 36 k if desired work additional rounds here to add more height to your brim round 27 27 31 33 37 fold up the tube with the wrong sides together the provisional cast on stitches will be on the inside of the tube line up the stitches on the inside and outside of the tube to ensure a straight brim is created with the left needle pick up a stitch from the provisional cast on and then knit the two stitches together repeat until all the stitches have been worked be careful not to miss any of the provisional cast on stitches when complete you should still have 40 45 48 50 55 stitches on your needles provisional cast on 1st stitch on left insert right needle into knit both stitches stitches needle plus 1st cast both stitches together on stitch body rounds 28 38 28 40 32 45 34 50 38 50 k to add slouch work 10 15+ additional rounds here before moving on to the
